DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Start Date and Time of Procedure Date and Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:The date and time of the beginning of the procedure.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The calendar date on which something is to start or did start._The time at which something is to start or did start._An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Start Date and Time of Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:The date and time of the beginning of the procedure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredName: Start Date and Time of Procedure
Property.preferredDefinition: The date and time of the beginning of the procedure.

Concepts.longName: Start Date and Time of Procedure
Concepts.definition: The date and time of the beginning of the procedure.
